name: WCC AVIATION COMPANY, INC
about: WCC Aviation Company, Inc., established in 2005, is a premier aviation training institution in the Philippines. With its main campus at the Binalonan Airfield, the school offers comprehensive programs in Flight Training, Aircraft Maintenance, and Flight Attendant courses. Starting with just two hobby aircraft and two students, WCC has grown to become one of the largest aviation training schools, boasting a fleet of 30 airplanes, a company-owned airfield, and state-of-the-art facilities including the ALSIM 200 MCC flight simulator. The school also operates campuses in Caloocan City and Quezon City, providing specialized training in aircraft mechanics and flight attendant services. WCC is committed to delivering first-rate training, ensuring the production of highly skilled aviation professionals for the industry. With a strong vision for excellence, WCC continues to lead in aviation education and training.
services:
["Aeronautical and Technological College
Pilot Academy
Flight Attendant
